lyrics:

intro
oh oh oh papers

verse 1
i cant get to work on time
cant believe the words to her i just said
but who the hell argue and fight like dogs at 6 in the morning
i know its gonna be some more shh tonight oohh
our pastors calling telling me i done went too far

cause i took a chance on love
its like im dying oooh dying

chorus
for you i gave my heart and turned my back against the world
cause you were my girl girl girl

you think i dont know whats up but sweetheart thats what ruined us
i aint afraid to say i got needs but the only time you here for me
is when the bottles popping and everything is sweet
but i im tired of sleeping in the other room spending them long nights
trying to figure out what in the hell in my heart i aint do right
